cofh.lib.fluid

Interface IFluidContainerItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICoFHItem, IContainerItem, net.minecraftforge.common.extensions.IForgeItem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockItemFluidCell, FluidContainerItem, FluidContainerItemAugmentable, FluidReservoirItem, PotionInfuserItem, PotionQuiverItem, WateringCanItem

    public interface IFluidContainerItem
extends IContainerItem
    Implement this interface on Item classes that support external manipulation of their internal fluid storage.

    NOTE: Use of NBT data on the containing ItemStack is encouraged.

      • getFluid

        default net.minecraftforge.fluids.FluidStack getFluid(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack container)
        Parameters:
        container - ItemStack which is the fluid container.
        Returns:
        FluidStack representing the fluid in the container, EMPTY if the container is empty.

      • isFluidValid

        default boolean isFluidValid(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack container,
                             net.minecraftforge.fluids.FluidStack resource)
        Parameters:
        container - ItemStack which is the fluid container.
        resource - FluidStack being queried.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the fluid is valid in this particular container.

      • getCapacity

        int getCapacity(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack container)
        Parameters:
        container - ItemStack which is the fluid container.
        Returns:
        Capacity of this fluid container.

      • fill

        default int fill(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack container,
                 net.minecraftforge.fluids.FluidStack resource,
                 net.minecraftforge.fluids.capability.IFluidHandler.FluidAction action)
        Parameters:
        container - ItemStack which is the fluid container.
        resource - FluidStack attempting to fill the container.
        action - If SIMULATE, the fill will only be simulated.
        Returns:
        Amount of fluid that was (or would have been, if simulated) filled into the container.

      • drain

        default net.minecraftforge.fluids.FluidStack drain(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack container,
                                                   int maxDrain,
                                                   net.minecraftforge.fluids.capability.IFluidHandler.FluidAction action)
        Parameters:
        container - ItemStack which is the fluid container.
        maxDrain - Maximum amount of fluid to be removed from the container.
        action - If SIMULATE, the drain will only be simulated.
        Returns:
        Fluidstack holding the amount of fluid that was (or would have been, if simulated) drained from the container.
